changeSet.author: synchro
changeSet.sql: CREATE COLUMN TABLE "${synchro.schema}"."/SYN/DIEF_PI_REGISTRO_TIPO_10"( "MANDT" NVARCHAR(3) NOT NULL, "EMPRESA" NVARCHAR(4) NOT NULL, "FILIAL" NVARCHAR(4) NOT NULL, "CNPJ" NVARCHAR(14), "IE" NVARCHAR(18), "NOME_ESTABELEC" NVARCHAR(255), "DESC_MUNICIPIO" NVARCHAR(40), "UF" NVARCHAR(2), "FONE" NVARCHAR(11), "DT_INI" NVARCHAR(8) NOT NULL, "DT_FIN" NVARCHAR(8) NOT NULL) UNLOAD PRIORITY 5 AUTO MERGE
